content: New generation NFT GAME to save the earth from alien invaders_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________     WEBSITE | TWITTER  | TELEGRAM  |_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________ABOUT DYSTOPI :DYSTOPI is skill-based MMORPG powerd by Binance Smart Chain.You can Gear up your hero with NFTs and Earn money. $DYS token is the main driver of the DYSTOPI economy. It's an in-game currency necessary to pay for services (repair items, refill potions, play minigames) & serves as reward as well.
